text: Hi, I’m Sneha Kulkarni, a software engineer facing harassment at my Bangalore workplace. I need help understanding if I can file a complaint under Karnataka labor law. I have chat transcripts and emails as proof.
My name is Ramesh Iyer. I’m a retired bank manager and have a property dispute in Maharashtra. I have the sale deed and old registration papers.
This is Nilofer. I'm a teacher from Kerala and I’ve been wrongly terminated from my school. I want to challenge this in court. I have my termination letter and past pay slips.
A businessman named Vikram Malhotra seeks advice on setting up a new company under Delhi jurisdiction. He has partnership agreements ready.
I am Neha. I was scammed in an online crypto investment and I want to report this in Mumbai. I have WhatsApp chats and bank statements.
Mr. Alok Verma, who works in government services, wants to draft a will for his assets in Uttar Pradesh. He already has the asset list and family tree document.

Hi, I’m Dipika Nair, a freelance writer living in Tamil Nadu. I'm seeking legal help for a copyright infringement case regarding one of my short stories. I have screenshots of the plagiarized content.
There is a woman named Pratibha Sharma who is looking to file a domestic violence complaint under Rajasthan jurisdiction. She has hospital records and police diary entries.
I'm Karan Singh, a student from West Bengal. I want legal guidance for a defamation case involving my college professor. I’ve preserved social media screenshots.
Hello. An architect named Ritu Deshmukh needs a legal review of her contract for a project in Gujarat. She has the contract draft and previous communication emails.
I'm Priya Mehta, a software engineer from Pune seeking help with property inheritance laws.
Need legal guidance. My name is Rahul Sharma and I work as a dentist in Mumbai. The issue is around false medical negligence charges.
I'm facing workplace harassment in Delhi. I'm Ananya Desai, a marketing executive. I have email threads and HR reports as evidence.
Hello, I’m requesting legal support on a cheque bounce case. I’m Vikas Jain, run a small textile business in Ahmedabad.
A client named Sneha, a journalist in Lucknow, wants to contest a defamation suit. She has published articles and WhatsApp messages as proof.
My name is Karan Kapoor. I'm from Chennai and work as a chef. I need advice regarding a rental dispute with my landlord.
I’m Aarav Singh, an HR manager in Hyderabad. I need help with employee contract termination legality. I have company policies for reference.
There’s a girl named Diya working in Kolkata as a lawyer. She wants help with cyberbullying charges filed against her.
My aunt Mrs. Arundhati Roy, a retired school principal from Nagpur, needs help with pension delay and legal recourse.
I’m Neil, a 24-year-old law student in Delhi. I want guidance on filing a PIL against environmental violations. I’ve gathered government reports and news clippings.
Hi, I’m Saif, a shopkeeper in Indore. Need help with a consumer court case. I’ve retained the customer complaints and bills.
My brother’s friend Amitabh, a police constable in Patna, is suspended without notice and needs legal counsel urgently.
I'm Vandana Kulkarni from Bhopal, a teacher, and my issue is around illegal land acquisition. I have property deeds and complaint letters.
A man named Sanjay Sethi who runs a café in Jaipur has received a legal notice from the municipality. He needs help understanding the implications.
I am Deepali, a freelance designer in Kochi. I am being accused of plagiarism. Can I get legal assistance?
Siddharth, a small-scale manufacturer from Ludhiana, is being charged unfair GST penalties. He has past return filings and CA opinions.
My friend Latika Sharma, an advocate in Chandigarh, wants to transfer a criminal case to another court for safety reasons.
Hello, I'm Rajeev Narayan. I'm retired from the Indian Railways and living in Varanasi. I wish to draft a will and need legal help.
I’m Gauri, a college student in Ranchi. I was wrongly detained during a protest. I have press coverage and ID proofs.
This is Nikhil Arora from Surat. I’m a chartered accountant. I need urgent support for a defamation suit from a client.
I am Meera Sinha, a retired school teacher from Jaipur. I'm seeking help in a property dispute with my siblings. I have the land deed and past court notices.
This is Rajeev Kapoor. I work as a software consultant. I live in Bangalore. I'm being harassed by my landlord despite paying rent on time. I have bank transfer receipts.
Hi, I'm a businessman from Surat, Rakesh Lohia. Need legal advice on a cheque bounce case. I have a scanned copy of the bounced cheque.
My name is Rani Pillai, a dentist practicing in Kochi. My clinic is facing a legal notice from a former employee. I have employment contracts and emails.
Namaste, this is Akash Narayan from Lucknow. I'm a small shop owner and my neighbor is encroaching on my shop space. I have a municipal map and complaint letter.
Hi, a woman named Simran Chadha, student of law in Delhi, needs urgent help regarding cyberbullying. Screenshots of abusive messages are available.
This is Shyam Mohanty. I recently got terminated from my job unfairly. I'm based in Bhubaneswar. I possess the termination letter and previous appraisal reports.
Greetings, my name is Priyanka Deshmukh. I'm a homemaker in Nagpur. My in-laws are trying to evict me from my house. I have a marriage certificate and police diary entry.
Hello, I'm Abhishek Jain. I run a printing press in Ahmedabad. I've been falsely accused of copyright violation. Here's the original agreement and proof of original designs.
I am Fatima Rizvi from Aligarh. I'm working as a nurse and my husband left me without notice. Need help with alimony case. I have marriage documents and salary slips.
It's Vishal Khanna here. I'm a tech analyst based in Pune. I’m facing defamation on social media. Screenshots and URLs are ready to share.
My cousin, Amrita Joshi, a government employee in Shimla, is being blackmailed by an ex. She has call recordings and WhatsApp chats as evidence.
My brother-in-law, Arun Paul, from Hyderabad, lost his job over false harassment claims. He’s a marketing head. He has chat logs and HR emails.
I’m a civil engineer named Neha Saxena living in Bhopal. My ex-business partner has filed a false claim against me. FIR copy and signed MoUs are with me.
This is Ehsan Ali from Ranchi. I'm a tailor and recently someone forged my identity to take a loan. I have police report and bank communication letters.
Hi there, Gitanjali Rao here, social worker in Kolkata. Need legal aid for a PIL regarding slum demolitions. I have pictures and an affidavit.
My name is Partha Sen. I'm based in Siliguri. A tenant is refusing to vacate my flat even after notice. He’s not paying rent. I have rent agreement and notice copy.
This is Dr. Arundhati Singh from Varanasi. I'm facing harassment from a pharmaceutical company. Emails and appointment letters are available.
Hi, I’m Salman Yusuf, a junior lawyer from Mumbai. I was not paid for freelance work. The email chain and invoice are attached.
This is Ankita Mehta, I live in Indore. My daughter’s school is charging illegal fees. I’m a homemaker. I have the circular and bank challan copies.
Hello, advocate needed. My name is Arvind Batra. I'm a 62-year-old retired banker from Chandigarh. I have a land conflict with my neighbor. I possess registry papers and old boundary survey.
I’m Teena Gupta, final-year medical student from Patna. I was scammed in an online tuition deal. Have chat screenshots and bank UTR.
Myself Sandeep Sharma from Gwalior. I'm an IT support executive. My company hasn’t paid my last 2 months salary. Salary slips and offer letter are ready.
I am Jaya Iyer from Thiruvananthapuram. A boy is stalking my daughter. Need urgent legal action. Screenshots and CCTV footage is available.
My cousin Neeraj Rathi, teacher in Meerut, has been wrongly arrested for theft. Please help. FIR and witness statements available.
I’m Rupal Seth, a freelance designer based in Goa. A client plagiarized my work. I have original designs and timestamped emails.
My uncle, Arvind Prasad, ex-army man from Dehradun, is being denied pension. Letters from defense ministry and bank slips attached.
My name is Lakshmi Krishnan from Chennai. I'm a data entry operator. Someone used my Aadhaar to get a SIM card. FIR and telecom complaint attached.
I'm Mohan Rao from Vizag. Builder has delayed possession of flat for over 3 years. I have the sale agreement and email follow-ups.
